1.label: basic on/off
1.description: triggered at change of the input I1 state and reflecting its state

2.label: basic on/of
2.description: triggered at change of the input I2 state and reflecting its state

3.label: multileve
3.description: triggered at changes of value of the Flush shutter position

4.label: multilevel
4.description: triggered at changes of value of slats tilting position

10.label: ALL ON / ALL OFF
10.description: Responds to commands ALL ON / ALL OFF from Main Controller

options.label: ALL ON is not active ALL OFF is not active
ALL ON is not active ALL OFF active
ALL ON is inactive ALL OFF is inactive
ALL ON active, ALL OFF active

40.label: Reporting in Watts on power change for Q1 or Q2
40.description: Power consumption change threshold for sending updates

42.label: Reporting in Watts by time interval for Q1 or Q2

72.label: Slats tilting full turn time
72.description: Slat full turn time in tenths of a second.

options.label: previously set position only in case of UI control
position in case of UI control, push
position in case of UI control, push button

74.label: Motor moving up/down time
74.description: Shutter motor moving time of complete opening or complete closing

78.label: Forced Shutter calibration
78.description: 0 to 1 a Shutter enters the calibration mode

85.label: Power consumption max delay time
85.description: max time before motor power consumption is read

90.label: Relay delay time
90.description: This parameter defines the time delay between output relay switching
